name: OMG Good Pumpkin Oatmeal Cookies
author: Lori Winchester
summary: 'Tis the season for yummy pumpkin goodness and this hits the spot!
ingredients: ½ cup chocolate chips, or to taste  (Optional)
½ cup raisins, or to taste  (Optional)
directions: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Line a baking sheet with parchment paper
Beat butter, white sugar, brown sugar, eggs, and vanilla extract together in a bowl using an electric mixer until smooth and creamy
Sift flour, pumpkin pie spice, baking soda, and salt together in a separate bowl
Stir flour mixture, about 1/4 cup at a time, into creamed butter mixture until dough is well combined; fold in oats, chocolate chips, and raisins
Drop dough by rounded spoonfuls onto the prepared baking sheet
Bake in the preheated oven until cookies are lightly browned on the bottom and sides, 7 to 9 minutes
Cool cookies on baking sheet for 5 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely
